attributes.action: Winter fuel payments for Disabled and terminally ill people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those of us who have disabilities that do not allow us to move around as much as others,and those who are terminally ill and on medications and having treatment do feel the cold so much.we do not feel we can afford to keep our homes heated and therefore cause ourselves more pain and discomfort,which we can ill afford to do.Please can we be included in the yearly payments? we deserve them just as much as those others that recieve it.There are plenty of others who share my veiw on this subject.This should also not be means tested,ie if you have a partner who has a job and you get excluded this way also.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
